      • changeBaseSpeed

        public void changeBaseSpeed(double speedChange)
        Changes the speed of the actor by a flat amount, best used for non-percentage based speed modifiers.
        Parameters:
        speedChange - the amount by which the speed is to be modified

      • addToSpeedModifier

        public void addToSpeedModifier(double d)

      • setUniqueSpeedModifier

        public void setUniqueSpeedModifier(double usm)
        Attempts to make the passed in speed modifier the unique speed modifier. If no current speed modifier is present then it accepts the parameter as the unique speed modifier, otherwise only accepts the parameter if it is greater than the current unique speed modifier.
        Parameters:
        usm - a percentage based modifier in the form of a decimal (12% to 0.12),
        . 0 will not have any effect, -1 will reset the modifier.

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed()
        Gets the apparent visual speed of this actor. This is the format in which all speed values should be presented to the user.
        Returns:
        the speed of the actor in units/second (pixels/second)

      • getTrueSpeed

        protected double getTrueSpeed()
          getTrueSpeed

           protected double getTrueSpeed()

          Returns the distance that is covered by this actor in one tick.

        Returns:
        actor's speed in units/tick

      • setTarget

        public void setTarget(Location target)
        Sets this actor's target location to a copy of the one passed in

        Does not change any at all movement related actor properties with the exception of setting need to move to false if the passed in target location is null.

        If the actor does not think that it needs to move to the target location, it will remain so and visa versa; to make the actor want to move as well use goTo(Location) instead

        Parameters:
        target - the new target location

      • setHomingTarget

        public void setHomingTarget(Location homingTarget)

      • goTo

        public void goTo(Location setTarget)
          goTo

           public void goTo(Location setTarget)

          Changes the target location of the actor to a copy of the one passed in as well as modifies actor properties to ready it up for movement

        Parameters:
        setTarget - the new target location

      • reachedTarget

        protected boolean reachedTarget()
        Checks if this actor's target location is within its bounds (if the actor is touching its target)
        Returns:
        a boolean value that shows whether or not this is true
